lessonTitleText: Moses and Aaron Speak to Pharaoh
lessonSubtitleText: Test how well you know this story

questions.text: When Moses and Aaron told Pharaoh to let the Israelites go, what did he say?
answers: I won't listen to the Lord; I don't even know who he is!
I will let them go right away
I need time to think about it
They can leave in one week

questions.text: How did Pharaoh make the Israelite slaves work harder?
answers: They had to gather straw, but make the same number of bricks
They were forced to work all night long
They were no longer given any tools
They had to work blindfolded

questions.text: When Moses told the people God would rescue them, how did they respond?
answers: They didn't listen because they had lost hope
They celebrated and rejoiced
They immediately left Egypt
They asked Moses questions

questions.text: What did God say Pharaoh would do after he saw God's mighty wonders?
answers: He would be stubborn and not let the people go
He would change his mind and obey God
He would ask Moses for help
He would leave Egypt himself

questions.text: What was the first miracle Aaron did in front of Pharaoh?
answers: Turn his staff into a snake
Turn water into blood
Call down fire from the sky
Cause an earthquake

questions.text: What happened when Pharaoh called his evil magicians?
answers: They did the same thing with their tricks
They believed in the Lord
They ran away in fear
They turned their staffs into worms

questions.text: What did Pharaoh do after he saw his magicians do the same trick?
answers: He refused to let the Israelites go
He believed in the Lord
He asked Moses to pray for him
He asked to be turned into a snake

questions.text: When Aaron held out his staff by the Nile River, what happened?
answers: God turned all of Egyptâ€™s water into blood
The Nile River dried up completely
Fish jumped out of the water
Pharaoh got a bloody nose

questions.text: What happened when Pharaoh called his evil magicians a second time?
answers: They did the same thing with their evil tricks
They could not copy the miracle
They turned water into wine
They turned the blood back into water

questions.text: After his magicians turned water into blood, what did Pharaoh do?
answers: Refused to let God's people go
Asked Moses for forgiveness
Let the Israelites leave Egypt
Asked them to turn the blood back into water
